pkgmetadata.longdescription: Building Sequences from SHP Waves // Based on the structure of the SPSS version of the Swiss Household Panel (SHP) data, provides a function seqFromWaves() that seeks the data of variables specified by the user in each of the wave files and collects them as sequences. The function also matches the sequences with variables from other files such as the master files of persons (MP) and households (MH), and social origins (SO). It can also match with activity calendar data (CA).
